title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2502.9 - Surcharges for submetered electricity or other utility service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2502.9 - Surcharges for submetered electricity or other utility service

State Regulations
(a) Where an owner
acts as a provider of a utility service (including, but not limited to
electricity, gas, cable or telecommunications), the owner may collect
surcharges which shall not be part of the legal regulated rent, and shall not
be subject to this Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2502.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
